forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. High 57F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers this evening with a steady, soaking rain overnight. Increasing winds. Low 9C. SE winds at 15 to 25 km/h, increasing to 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then becoming windy with a steady rain overnight. Low 48F. SE winds at 10 to 15 mph, increasing to 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm. Higher wind gusts possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Higher wind gusts possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. SSW winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 53F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 52F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 49F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 43F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High near 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
